value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Discover the tools available to detect and correct problems with your Azure Storage to enable your cloud storage infrastructure to operate at peak performance.

images.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks

value.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

images.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup

value.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit
value.excerpt: Get started with Q# programming by building a quantum random number generator.

images.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit

value.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, youâ€™ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

images.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

value.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Secure your Azure SQL Database to keep your data secure and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

images.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Review multidimensional metrics for the load balancer in Azure Monitor Metrics, and check health probe status for the load balancer.

images.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer

value.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
value.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying relational databases, and querying relational data through cloud data solutions with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, and Azure Database for MariaDB. Explore scenarios for using these database management systems.

images.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and Azure Database for MySQL.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Query relational data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure
Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will be provided with a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI. You will be able to describe what AI happens to be and the technologies that underpin it. You will be able to share  how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: This module provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. We then dive into how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

images.title: Introduction to AI technology

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: This module is a starting point for business decision makers who want to understand how Microsoft is creating products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI). Weâ€™ll also help you understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

images.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
Introduction to AI technology

value.title: Introduction to machine learning with Python and Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Python has become a dominant language for doing data analysis with machine learning. Learn how to leverage Python and associated libraries in Jupyter Notebooks run on Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends.

topItems.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

topItems.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
topItems.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

topItems.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
topItems.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
value.excerpt: Inâ€¯education, decision-makers mustâ€¯take into accountâ€¯specificâ€¯industryâ€¯considerationsâ€¯before they can realize the true transformational power of AI. Educational institutions and organizations need to think strategically about AIâ€”and they need to start today. To create real value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: In manufacturing, decision-makers must take into account specific industry considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI in the enterprise. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month. Use this understanding to create an Azure budget to monitor and alert on your costs.

images.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

images.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Azure Container Registry is a managed Docker registry service based on the open-source Docker Registry 2.0. Container Registry is private, hosted in Azure, and allows you to build, store, and manage images for all types of container deployments. Learn how to build and store container images with Azure Container Registry.

images.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry

value.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Characterize the types of business processes that Logic Apps can automate. Describe the function of connectors, triggers, and actions and show how you combine them to create an app.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Deploy highly available solutions with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy highly available solutions with Azure SQL

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability

value.title: Build and query a Delta Lake
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Delta Lake to create, append, and upsert data to Apache Spark tables, taking advantage of built-in reliability and optimizations.

images.title: Build and query a Delta Lake

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

images.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
